name: WrappedClassInstance
description: An advanced reflection-based wrapper that provides dynamic access to Java class instances and their members in JSMacros scripts.
overview: The WrappedClassInstance class serves as a universal wrapper around any Java object. It allows for dynamic method invocation using method names or signatures, field access and modification for any accessible field, support for inheritance hierarchies and interface implementation, automatic parameter type conversion and compatibility checking, and method signature parsing for precise method identification. It is primarily used through the FReflection library.

constructors.description: Creates a new wrapper around an existing Java instance, automatically detecting its class type.
Creates a wrapper for a class type, useful when working with static members or when the instance is null.

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: The Java object to wrap (can be null)

parameters.name: tClass
parameters.description: The class type to use for reflection

methods.name: getRawInstance
methods.description: Retrieves the raw Java object instance being wrapped.

methods.name: getRawClass
methods.description: Retrieves the Class object of the wrapped instance.

methods.name: getFieldValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specific field from the wrapped instance.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the field to access

methods.name: getFieldValueAsClass
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a field treating the instance as a specific class.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the field to access

methods.name: setFieldValue
methods.description: Modifies the value of a specific field in the wrapped instance.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the field to modify

methods.name: setFieldValueAsClass
methods.description: Modifies the value of a field treating the instance as a specific class.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the field to modify

methods.name: invokeMethod
methods.description: Invokes a method on the wrapped instance using its name or full signature.

parameters.name: methodNameOrSig
parameters.description: The simple name of the method or its specific bytecode signature

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Variable arguments to pass to the method

methods.name: invokeMethodAsClass
methods.description: Invokes a method on the wrapped instance treating it as a specific class context.
